teal.audio

Class MidiSynthesizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.audio.MidiSynthesizer

  • public class MidiSynthesizer
extends java.lang.Object
    MidiSynthesizer can be used to play notes on an available midi device (typically the soundcard, by default). No available midi devices will result in a MidiUnavailableException.
